languages.text: {n}Старик с фиалковыми глазами виновато склоняет голову.{/n} "Леса, в которых живет этот жрец и его народ, всегда были полны мудрости и жизни. Но огненный дождь, насланный чужаками-из-тьмы одну великую и одну малую луну назад, разгневал духов леса. Этому жрецу нужно отыскать путь домой, в сердце Кетца Темера, и провести ритуал усмирения вместе с племенем. До тех пор духи продолжат страдать и путать тропы. До тех пор... Звездорожденные не смогут вернуться к звездам".

{n}The old man guiltily lowers his head.{/n} "The forest-home of this priest and his people had always been full of wisdom and life. But the fire-rain called by the outsiders-from-the-darkness one great moon and one small moon ago angered the forest spirits. This priest must find his way home, to the heart of Quetza Temer, and perform the soothing ritual alongside his tribe. Until he does, the spirits will suffer and twist the trails. Until he does... the Starborn will not be able to return to the stars."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик с фиалковыми глазами виновато склоняет голову.{/n} "Леса, в которых живет этот жрец и его народ, всегда были полны мудрости и жизни. Но огненный дождь, насланный чужаками-из-тьмы одну великую и одну малую луну назад, разгневал духов леса. Этому жрецу нужно отыскать путь домой, в сердце Кетца Темера, и провести ритуал усмирения вместе с племенем. До тех пор духи продолжат страдать и путать тропы. До тех пор... Звездорожденные не смогут вернуться к звездам".

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme baisse la tête d'un air coupable.{/n} « La forêt qui abrite ce prêtre et son peuple a toujours été fourmillante de vie et emplie de sagesse, mais les étrangers venus des ténèbres ont provoqué la colère des esprits lorsqu'ils ont fait tomber la pluie de feu il y a une grande lune et une petite lune de cela. Ce prêtre doit retrouver le chemin de son village, au cœur de Quetza Temer, afin d'y accomplir le rituel d'apaisement avec sa tribu. Tant que ce ne sera pas fait, les esprits souffriront et bouleverseront les sentiers. Tant que ce ne sera pas fait... les Stellaires ne pourront pas regagner les étoiles. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man guiltily lowers his head.{/n} "The forest-home of this priest and his people had always been full of wisdom and life. But the fire-rain called by the outsiders-from-the-darkness one great moon and one small moon ago angered the forest spirits. This priest must find his way home, to the heart of Quetza Temer, and perform the soothing ritual alongside his tribe. Until he does, the spirits will suffer and twist the trails. Until he does... the Starborn will not be able to return to the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme baisse la tête d'un air coupable.{/n} « La forêt qui abrite ce prêtre et son peuple a toujours été fourmillante de vie et emplie de sagesse, mais les étrangers venus des ténèbres ont provoqué la colère des esprits lorsqu'ils ont fait tomber la pluie de feu il y a une grande lune et une petite lune de cela. Ce prêtre doit retrouver le chemin de son village, au cœur de Quetza Temer, afin d'y accomplir le rituel d'apaisement avec sa tribu. Tant que ce ne sera pas fait, les esprits souffriront et bouleverseront les sentiers. Tant que ce ne sera pas fait... les Stellaires ne pourront pas regagner les étoiles. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann senkt schuldbewusst den Kopf.{/n} "Das Waldheim dieses Priesters und seiner Gemeinde war immer voller Weisheit und Leben gewesen. Doch der Feuerregen, den die Fremden-aus-der-dunkelheit vor einem großen Mond und einem kleinen Mond herabgerufen haben, hat die Waldgeister erzürnt. Dieser Priester muss den Weg nach Hause finden, ins Herz von Quetza Temer, und gemeinsam mit seinem Stamm das lindernde Ritual ausführen. Bis er dies tut, werden die Geister leiden und die Wege weiter verzerren. Bis er dies tut ... werden die Sternengeborenen nicht in die Sterne zurückkehren können."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man guiltily lowers his head.{/n} "The forest-home of this priest and his people had always been full of wisdom and life. But the fire-rain called by the outsiders-from-the-darkness one great moon and one small moon ago angered the forest spirits. This priest must find his way home, to the heart of Quetza Temer, and perform the soothing ritual alongside his tribe. Until he does, the spirits will suffer and twist the trails. Until he does... the Starborn will not be able to return to the stars."

Doch der Feuerregen, den die Fremden-aus-der-dunkelheit vor einem großen Mond und einem kleinen Mond herabgerufen haben, hat die Waldgeister erzürnt. Dieser Priester muss den Weg nach Hause finden, ins Herz von Quetza Temer, und gemeinsam mit seinem Stamm das lindernde Ritual ausführen. Bis er dies tut, werden die Geister leiden und die Wege weiter verzerren. Bis er dies tut ... werden die Sternengeborenen nicht in die Sterne zurückkehren können."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}El anciano, culpable, agacha la cabeza.{/n} «El bosque que sirve de hogar a este sacerdote y su pueblo siempre ha estado lleno de sabiduría y vida. Pero la lluvia de fuego que trajeron los forasteros de allende la oscuridad hace una gran luna y una pequeña luna enfureció a los espíritus del bosque. Este sacerdote debe encontrar el camino a casa, al corazón de Quetza Temer, y celebrar el ritual de apaciguamiento junto a su tribu. Hasta entonces, los espíritus sufrirán y deformarán los caminos. Hasta entonces... {mf|el Hijo|la Hija} de las Estrellas no podrá volver a ellas».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man guiltily lowers his head.{/n} "The forest-home of this priest and his people had always been full of wisdom and life. But the fire-rain called by the outsiders-from-the-darkness one great moon and one small moon ago angered the forest spirits. This priest must find his way home, to the heart of Quetza Temer, and perform the soothing ritual alongside his tribe. Until he does, the spirits will suffer and twist the trails. Until he does... the Starborn will not be able to return to the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano, culpable, agacha la cabeza.{/n} «El bosque que sirve de hogar a este sacerdote y su pueblo siempre ha estado lleno de sabiduría y vida. Pero la lluvia de fuego que trajeron los forasteros de allende la oscuridad hace una gran luna y una pequeña luna enfureció a los espíritus del bosque. Este sacerdote debe encontrar el camino a casa, al corazón de Quetza Temer, y celebrar el ritual de apaciguamiento junto a su tribu. Hasta entonces, los espíritus sufrirán y deformarán los caminos. Hasta entonces... {mf|el Hijo|la Hija} de las Estrellas no podrá volver a ellas».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}老人は、バツが悪そうに頭を下げる。{/n}「この司祭とその民の森の家は、常に知恵と生命に溢れていました。しかし、1大月と1小月前に、闇から来たよそ者が降らせた火の雨が、森の精霊達を怒らせた。司祭はケツァ・テメルの中心部へ帰る道を見つけ、彼の部族とともになだめる儀式をしなければならないのです。儀式が終わらなければ、精霊達は苦しみ、道を歪めてしまう。儀式がなければ…スターボーンは星に戻ることができません」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man guiltily lowers his head.{/n} "The forest-home of this priest and his people had always been full of wisdom and life. But the fire-rain called by the outsiders-from-the-darkness one great moon and one small moon ago angered the forest spirits. This priest must find his way home, to the heart of Quetza Temer, and perform the soothing ritual alongside his tribe. Until he does, the spirits will suffer and twist the trails. Until he does... the Starborn will not be able to return to the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は、バツが悪そうに頭を下げる。{/n}「この司祭とその民の森の家は、常に知恵と生命に溢れていました。しかし、1大月と1小月前に、闇から来たよそ者が降らせた火の雨が、森の精霊達を怒らせた。司祭はケツァ・テメルの中心部へ帰る道を見つけ、彼の部族とともになだめる儀式をしなければならないのです。儀式が終わらなければ、精霊達は苦しみ、道を歪めてしまう。儀式がなければ…スターボーンは星に戻ることができません」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}老人内疚地低下了头。{/n}“此祭司与民众的森林之家，之前一直充满了智慧与生命。然而，大月亮与小月亮从黑暗之中召唤来的火雨却激怒了森林的精魂。此祭司必须找到回家的路，回到格扎尔特默的中心，与部落的人民一起举行安抚仪式。若非如此，那些精魂会痛苦不堪，扭曲丛林中的路径。若非如此……星裔将再也无法重返群星。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man guiltily lowers his head.{/n} "The forest-home of this priest and his people had always been full of wisdom and life. But the fire-rain called by the outsiders-from-the-darkness one great moon and one small moon ago angered the forest spirits. This priest must find his way home, to the heart of Quetza Temer, and perform the soothing ritual alongside his tribe. Until he does, the spirits will suffer and twist the trails. Until he does... the Starborn will not be able to return to the stars."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人内疚地低下了头。{/n}“此祭司与民众的森林之家，之前一直充满了智慧与生命。然而，大月亮与小月亮从黑暗之中召唤来的火雨却激怒了森林的精魂。此祭司必须找到回家的路，回到格扎尔特默的中心，与部落的人民一起举行安抚仪式。若非如此，那些精魂会痛苦不堪，扭曲丛林中的路径。若非如此……星裔将再也无法重返群星。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam, kabahatli bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu rahibin ve halkının ormandaki yuvası, her daim bilgelik ve hayatla dolu olmuştur. Ancak bir büyük bir de küçük ay evvel karanlıktan gelen ruhların çağırdığı ateş yağmuru, orman ruhlarını öfkelendirdi. Bu rahip, Quetza Temer'in merkezindeki yuvasına gitmenin bir yolunu bulmalı ve kabilesiyle birlikte yatıştırma ayinini gerçekleştirmeli. O zamana dek ruhlar acı çekip yolları birbirine karıştıracaklar. O zamana dek... Yıldızdoğan, yıldızlara dönemeyecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man guiltily lowers his head.{/n} "The forest-home of this priest and his people had always been full of wisdom and life. But the fire-rain called by the outsiders-from-the-darkness one great moon and one small moon ago angered the forest spirits. This priest must find his way home, to the heart of Quetza Temer, and perform the soothing ritual alongside his tribe. Until he does, the spirits will suffer and twist the trails. Until he does... the Starborn will not be able to return to the stars."
